attributes.review: This app presents a picture of Trump as soon as u open it which we all know is a risky thing to show because as soon as it was on my phone, my screen shattered because he is absolutely so horrendously ugly. Do not get it will shatter the screen protecter too!
attributes.title: Hot garbage

attributes.review: This app is disgusting. Right as I clicked on it, my power went out and my phone died. And THEN, when I was walking my caterpillar through the Atlantic Ocean, it stole my pet fish! Absolutely horrible app. I would give it 0stars if I could.  0/10. Would not recommend to ANYONE.
attributes.title: HORRIBLE APP

attributes.review: It took almost 2 weeks for this app to download but when it did, it didn’t even let me open the app for almost a month. Then when I opened the app, it asked me if I was legal or not! WHY ARE YOU BEINF RACIST TRUMP?!?! After pressing I’m legal it asked me if I was a negro! A NEGRO TRUMP!!! REALLY?!?! I WOULD RATHER HAVE AN APPLE FOR PRESIDENT THAN YOU!!! TRUMP IS GOING DOWN 2020!!!
attributes.title: Worst app ever! 👁👄👁👀

attributes.review: As soon as I download it, it won’t open. And when it does open. It completely freezes my phones screen and I have to do a full shut down. Fix it or delete it.
attributes.title: Is this even an app?

attributes.review: This app brainwashed my whole family to kill theme selves. I mean they are trump supporters so I wasn’t sad. But please be careful Trump is controlling anyone who uses the app. One thing I did like is that I got all their stuff but other than that 0/5 would not recommend.
As seen in the reviews this app is a waste of your time a waste of your space in your phone I definitely would not recommend this app for how crucial it is and how racist thank you for your time
attributes.title: This app is not worth downloading

attributes.review: im DEVASTATED. HURT. this app is the reason my grandma DIED. i am BEYOND words at the moment. i’m LIVID. my grandma’s dying wish was “please, remove the Trump 2020 app from the app store” and i had to tell her, on her DEATHBED, that it was OUT OF MY POWER. i’m doing my best, but i am MOURNING. the only thing i can do in this time of GRIEVING is rate it 1 star and encourage others to DO THE SAME.
attributes.title: IM DEVASTATED

attributes.review: This app is totally worthless and show be immediately removed from the app store. Everything on it is biased and ignorant and stupid and we need to vote him out in November. Genuinely wish I could leave this a zero star review.
attributes.title: Terrible App Terrible Information Terrible President
